channel.title: Kreedomscape ~ new rsps ~ - Need Staff - fully working dice bag + much more
channel.description:
Hello there Kreedomscape is a brand new RSPS, put online only yesterday. On our first day, we managed to get 7 players online ! We're a friendly community who is looking for new staff and players, we're doing a special offer so that when you join, you get one item of your choice! (No rares like phat, can only be like a godsword, chaotic or anything else). We're not like other servers, our everyone in our community will treat you with respect, and we dont have the over used edgeville home, but we added a twist and made it in kajarma It's good, trust me! Kreedomscape, unlike most insidiax sources is not leached. We took the origonal insidiax base and we are working on it, our coder needs some help too since he's not an expert coder, but he is good. We do not have a staff team, so it's up for grabs! Heres the list as of 17:38 06/05/2014 Owner-Jamie Co-Owner Faris Admins - None! Moderators - None! Here are some of the features we have in our server, not all, but some Dueling (Still working on a bug) God wars dungeon (FULLY working, tele straight to boss) Many different shops at home Yell command for donors + KBD Nomand Full vesta and statius available in shops Player owned shops 24/7 hosted Fully working barrows Pest control Tzhaar Fully working PK'ing Easy to switch prayers and spell books Owner and co-owner on alot so you can easily get help AND MUCH MUCH MORE!
Unfortuantley, I cannot upload pics due to problems with my PC, but the link to the webclient and downloadable client is www.kreedomscape.weebly.com If you're webclient isn't working, follow these steps. 1) Control panel 2) Search Java 3) Press Java 4) Security 5) Edit site list 6) Add these three sites to your list https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=Kreescape http://www.rspscodingloaders.com/loaders/insidiax.jar www.kreedomscape.weebly.com
Thanks, Luke Jamie Rowland & Leon Faris Wilson

item.title: Kreedomscape ~ new rsps ~ - Need Staff - fully working dice bag + much more
item.dc:creator: @troyw2000 troyw2000
item.description:
@troyw2000 wrote:

Hello there
Kreedomscape is a brand new RSPS, put online only yesterday. On our first day, we managed to get 7 players online ! We’re a friendly community who is looking for new staff and players, we’re doing a special offer so that when you join, you get one item of your choice! (No rares like phat, can only be like a godsword, chaotic or anything else). We’re not like other servers, our everyone in our community will treat you with respect, and we dont have the over used edgeville home, but we added a twist and made it in kajarma It’s good, trust me!
Kreedomscape, unlike most insidiax sources is not leached. We took the origonal insidiax base and we are working on it, our coder needs some help too since he’s not an expert coder, but he is good. We do not have a staff team, so it’s up for grabs! Heres the list as of 17:38 06/05/2014
Owner-Jamie
Co-Owner Faris
Admins - None!
Moderators - None!
Here are some of the features we have in our server, not all, but some
Dueling (Still working on a bug)
God wars dungeon (FULLY working, tele straight to boss)
Many different shops at home
Yell command for donors +
KBD
Nomand
Full vesta and statius available in shops
Player owned shops
24/7 hosted
Fully working barrows
Pest control
Tzhaar
Fully working PK’ing
Easy to switch prayers and spell books
Owner and co-owner on alot so you can easily get help
AND MUCH MUCH MORE!

Unfortuantley, I cannot upload pics due to problems with my PC, but the link to the webclient and downloadable client is www.kreedomscape.weebly.com
If you’re webclient isn’t working, follow these steps.

  1. Control panel
  2. Search Java
  3. Press Java
  4. Security
  5. Edit site list
  6. Add these three sites to your list
    https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=Kreescape
    http://www.rspscodingloaders.com/loaders/insidiax.jar
    www.kreedomscape.weebly.com

Thanks,
Luke Jamie Rowland & Leon Faris Wilson
